title: Leaver Buster
body:
I recently got a leaver buster for leaving a game, and so I did the 3 games I was asked of to do. So I go and finish my third game, and to some odd reason, it still says, "You have been placed in a lower priority queue for 2 more games."

I'm pretty sure this is a bug.

Please get back to me soon,
Thanks,
Megabotus

replies.body: You most likely had 5 LPW games initially. If you only saw 3 to start off with it was most likely some really weird visual bug, and the second message was letting you know how many you had left and they weren't actually additional LPQ games.
The LeaverBuster system gives out low priority queues in a group of 5 games.
